extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Qarsoodi og, Adblock aamin ah YouTube™. Wuxuu xannibaa xayaysiisyada YouTube.com

timesaveInfo.message: Xayeysiiska Youtube™ ee la kaydiyay qiyaastii. $savedTime$ ee noloshaada.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Muuji codsiyada la xannibay oo ku jira calaamad
